original_text: But Lot did not move. So the angels took hold of Lot's hand, as well as the hands of his wife and his two daughters. The Lord was very kind to Lot and his family and the angels led them away from the city.
korean_text: 그러나 롯이 지체하매 그 사람들이 롯의 손과 그 아내의 손과 두 딸의 손을 잡아 인도하여 성 밖에 두니 여호와께서 그에게 자비를 더하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: So the angels took hold of Lot's hand,
as well as the hands of his wife and his two daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내와 두 딸들의 손도 잡았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord was very kind to Lot and his family
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서는 롯과 그의 가족에게 매우 친절하셨으며,

sentences.original_text: and the angels led them away from the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 천사들은 그들을 그 성에서 이끌어 내었습니다.
